bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. Arlington and Johnson. Memo to the Sheriff
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Pierce } SS
To the Sheriff on Constable and the Keeper of the jail of Daniel County

Whereas Tim Johnson of Tacoma Pierce County Washington Territory has been brought this day before the proceedings once of the justice of the Peace in and for said county The argued i the oath of M Brotton with having on the 23rd day of January 1880. The said county committed the defence of visiting a home sued by the Henry Arlington the propose of smoking and in-taking opium by other persons and trial then and there having the said defense Tim Johnson did smoke and inhale opium Contrary to the form of the statute in case made & presided and in the process of the trial of said charge it appearing to the said justice that said Tim Johnson has been givith of the offense of being found a strome kept as an opium joint and
